events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position. Thank you for your interest in joining our development team.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department for further review by our technical recruitment team.
A recruiter specializing in engineering hires has been assigned to guide you through the hiring process. Expect an update soon.
The initial screening was completed successfully. Your background and skills match well with our requirements.
Thank you for your prompt response regarding the next steps. We appreciate your enthusiasm and availability.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 10 am. Please prepare accordingly and reach out for any queries.
